Description
Category
This class defines Categories which can be associated with a definition.
CountryCodeRuleWrapper
Some field definitions are country specific for example a postal code within the UK is difined differently to a zip code in the United States but both are used within the same area of an address block
DoubleValidationRule
This rule assumes the field is a valid double number and allows us to place ranges on what value the field can be (e.g.
EnumValidationRule
Some field definitions have a limited number of allowed string values and so this definition allows us to maintain a list rather than a regular expression.
FieldDefinition
This class defines Complex Structured Data field definitions we can assign to various structured data schema's.
FieldDefinitionServices
 
LongValidationRule
This is used for whole integer numbers when used in fields and allows us to validate that they are within an acceptable range.

SingleValidationRuleFieldDefinition
Used to define a single Field type and a rule to be associated with it.
StringValidationRule
Defines regular expression rules for a field to confirm if the field is valid or not.
